name: BoxFaceTest
description:
Cursor is invisible so you have to aim the middle of the screen at the box.

lmb is to select and q is to rewind selected

Complete the test in this colorful puzzle game full of cute boxes and adorable faces.

a-d to rotate the room.

r to restart

q to rewind a box

lmb to select a box to rewind

rmb to grab a box
